abstract: Bankers and real estate executives, concerned about property values, are paying close attention to leases offered by energy industry representatives to homeowners for the right to drill for natural gas on their land; an increasing number of leases have been offered as natural gas drilling spreads across the country and many are concerned about potential property damage and other environmental issues.
snippet: Worried about property values, and landowners signing drilling leases without clearance, lenders are trying to reinforce restrictions.
lead_paragraph: Worried about property values, and landowners signing drilling leases without clearance, lenders are trying to reinforce restrictions.

headline.main: Rush to Drill for Natural Gas Creates Conflicts With Mortgages
headline.print_headline: A Rush to Sign Leases for Gas Runs Into Mortgage Restriction
headline.seo: Rush to Drill for Gas Creates Mortgage Conflicts
